options.fig.cap: Figure 1: Overview map of the Metro Bike Share stations in Los Angeles and the research area of this project (blue).
options.label: Figure 1

options.fig.cap: Figure 2: Plot of the distances and the durations of bike trips in cluster A (without return trips) to get a better understanding of the data.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-5

options.fig.cap: Figure 3: Balance of trips starting (positive) and ending (negative) at all stations.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-7

options.fig.cap: Figure 4: Balance of trips starting (positive) and ending (negative) at Union Station West Portal and Main & 1st.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-75

options.fig.cap: Figure 5: Map of ___cumulative trip ratio___ showing the difference between trips arriving and trips departing from a station. The blue dots show stations where many bike trips end, the red dots represent stations many people start their trip from.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-8

options.fig.cap: Figure 6: Map of bike stations and metro stations and the convex hull (red).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-10

options.fig.cap: Figure 7: Histogram and density of the shortest distances from bike stations to the next metro station.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-11

options.fig.cap: Figure 8: Map of bike stations that lie within the metro station buffers. The circles that can be activated represent the absolute number of bike trips starting at these bike stations.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-12

options.fig.cap: Figure 9: The average number of trips per day type (weekday-day vs. weekend-day).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-16

options.fig.cap: Figure 10: The average number of trips on each day of the week.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-18

options.fig.cap: Figure 11: An analysis of electric and standard bikes in terms of different movement parameters.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-19

options.fig.cap: Figure 12: The average number of trips by commuters and tourists over the course of a day.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-23

options.fig.cap: Figure 13: The average number of trips over the course of a day, comparing commuters and tourists.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-27

options.fig.cap: Figure 14: The average number of trips per day of the week the course of a day, comparing commuters and tourists.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-28
